name: Fury - The Wrath of Taljun Cathu
overview: He has been imprisoned in deathly sleep for 3000 years with his evil magic chained. He waited for revenge and now waits no more! Become a one man legion and save the world from this demonic demise. You must journey through 5 strange worlds filled with unspeakable terrors conjured from the vengeful dreams of the evil wizard Taljun Cathu.
